ROADMAP.md.description: Vendure vs Medusa 2.0 comparison section added at end of document (lines 3401-3720). Comprehensive analysis for multi-brand/multi-domain scenarios comparing native multi-channel support, REST vs GraphQL APIs, architecture diagrams, infrastructure costs, and clear recommendations: Vendure for Adam multi-brand expansion (native channels, unified admin, lower cost), Medusa for single-store danieltarazona.com (simpler setup, REST familiarity).
